SEARCH
Package edu.rpi.legup.model.gameboard

Class Board

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.legup.model.gameboard.Board
Direct Known Subclasses:
CaseBoard, GridBoard
public abstract class Board extends Object
Abstract class representing a game board. This class provides functionality for managing puzzle elements, tracking modifications, and determining if the board is modifiable.
